meanings.definition: The act of making changes or modifications to something.
meanings.sent1: The alteration of the recipe made the cake taste better.
meanings.sent2: The tailor made an alteration to the dress to make it fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The alteration of the painting turned it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her alteration of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The alteration of the room's layout created a more spacious feel.

meanings.definition: The result of making changes or modifications to something.
meanings.sent1: The alteration in the design improved its functionality.
meanings.sent2: After the alteration, the building looked completely different.
meanings.sent3: The alteration in the plan caused a lot of confusion.
meanings.sent4: The alteration in the weather brought unexpected storms.
meanings.sent5: The alteration in the schedule led to a more efficient workflow.
